56584.<voice 03520_00056584><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03520_00056584><start_lip_sync n02135 _normal m00001>That Mr. Zodera. Your words allowed me

56585.<voice 03550_00056585><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03550_00056585><start_lip_sync n02135 _normal m00001>But why did you say those words to me

56532.<voice 00110_00056532><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00110_00056532><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Are you out of your mind, Zodera?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56533.<voice 00205_00056533><start_lip_sync n0:
Dear Grandpriest, after losing Janna, I left the troupe and wandered around in the depths of despair, but you gave
me salvation.

56534.<voice 00235_00056534><start_lip_sync n0:
I thought it was my way to repay that debt by becoming the new Grand Priest. Until I saw Gizant and his group
perform today.

56535.<voice 00285_00056535><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00285_00056535><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>I ask your permission to return to
them.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56536.<voice 00330_00056536><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00330_00056536><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>What are you talking about, Zodera?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56537.<voice 00400_00056537><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00400_00056537><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>That's right. My real name is Sitar,
and I was the head of that troupe.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56538.<voice 00440_00056538><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00440_00056538><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>I didn't know that.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56539.<voice 00480_00056539><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00480_00056539><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>You have a good face, Zodera. That is
your true face, isn't it? You finally
showed it to me.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56540.<voice 00540_00056540><start_lip_sync n0:
A vocation is a job that allows you to express your true self. It is one of our duties as Allmighty Alltrades
officers to guide people to their true calling.

56541.<voice 00580_00056541><start_lip_sync n0:
That is why I have invited the Gizant troupe. I wanted to know what you would think after witnessing the hard
work and effort of the troupe.

56542.<voice 00610_00056542><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00610_00056542><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>In other words, my inviting the troupe
for the sideshow this time was my own
idea. Hohoho.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56543.<voice 00650_00056543><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00650_00056543><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>What a surprise. I can't thank you
enough for your thoughtfulness,
Grandpriest.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56544.<voice 00680_00056544><start_lip_sync n0:
As you say, I have found my calling. As a Sitar, I will return to the troupe and vow to fulfill my artistic
vocation.

56545.<voice 00820_00056545><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00820_00056545><start_lip_sync n02135 _normal m00001>Mr. Zodera! What do you mean you're

anything?<stop_lip_animation n02135 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56546.<voice 00860_00056546><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00860_00056546><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I'm sorry. He pushed me into it. I
told him about you.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56547.<voice 00900_00056547><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00900_00056547><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>I didn't care. I've decided to return
to Sitar. I don't need the Zodera name
anymore.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56549.<voice 00980_00056549><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00980_00056549><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>And if possible. I'd like to be in the

56550.<voice 01020_00056550><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01020_00056550><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>No, I don't think so. You are and

troupe. Am I right? Chairman Sitar!<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56551.<voice 01092_00056551><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01092_00056551><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>Thank you Gizant. You call me the
